item.title: Two weeks in Montenegro
item.dc:creator: Sarah Duff
item.description:
After a year of studying in London (with not much adventurous travel) I was in need of a break. I wanted to go somewhere in Europe which would offer a bit of autumn sunshine,  a bit of ocean swimming, mountains, some good food, no Internet connection and a lot of hiking. Without knowing that much […]

The post Two weeks in Montenegro appeared first on Duff's Suitcase.

item.title: A road trip around Iceland
item.dc:creator: Sarah Duff
item.description:
I’ve always wanted to visit Iceland, but I always saw it in the same league as Antarctica: the kind of place that I’d maybe get to later in my life, when I have more money. Like Antarctica, it seemed so far away and so expensive – a place you save up to see after you’ve gone […]

The post A road trip around Iceland appeared first on Duff's Suitcase.

item.title: Switzerland without the skis
item.dc:creator: Sarah Duff
item.description:
When I first saw the itinerary of my trip to central Switzerland in the middle of winter I thought there was a page missing. Where was the bit where we skiied for days? I’d been to Switzerland before and all I’d done was ski and eat mountains of chocolate. It turns out that there’s a […]

The post Switzerland without the skis appeared first on Duff's Suitcase.
